A

T

TemplateTMP - Class in datadraw
This is a template class and can be used to start a new processing library or tool.
TemplateTMP(PApplet) - Constructor for class datadraw.TemplateTMP
a Constructor, usually called in the setup() method in your sketch to initialize and start the library.
ToScreenSpace(PVector) - Method in class datadraw.CameraControl
Transforms a point from world coordinates (modifed by panning and zooming) to screen coordinates (in pixels).
ToWorldSpace(PVector) - Method in class datadraw.CameraControl
Transforms a point from screen coordinates (in pixels) to coordinates modified by the panning and zooming CameraControl enables.
